location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a copy of a translation of a letter, dated 6 February 1811, from Meerza Mohamed Jan to Jonathan Duncan, Governor of Bombay. The translated letter regards Meerza Mohamed Jan's dispute with his brother, Mahomed Hussain Khan [Muhammad Husain Khan], over the estate of their late father.
